body.name: VASAGLE 6-Tier Tall Bookshelf, Bookcase, Large Metal Shelf, 11.8 x 47.2 x 67.9 Inches, for Living Room, Kitchen, Pantry, Study, Home Office, Rustic Brown and Black ULLS114B01
features: [Large Capacity] This 67.9" tall bookshelf has 6 shelves (size of each shelf: 11.8"D x 47.2"W), which offer enough space to store your daily items or collect trophies and souvenirs

[High Stability] The particleboard, a steel frame, and the X-bar on the back offer a sturdy structure that holds up to 600 lb in total; the anti-tip kit ensures the stability and adjustable feet balance out any unevenness in the floor
[Details on Every Level] This bookcase comes with horizontal bars on both sides of each level to prevent things from sliding off; the height between each level is high enough for storage boxes

[Use in Various Places] Place this shelving unit in the living room as a divider, display, or storage shelf; in the study for books, magazines, and DVDs; on the balcony for potted plants; in the kitchen for bottles and jars
[Assembly Is a Breeze] No difficult assembly here. With clear instructions, numbered parts, and assembly tools included, this storage shelf will be assembled before you know it

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VASAGLE Storage Shelf Use it as a divider, giving your space more possibilities.

Adjustable Feet Adjustable feet ensure stability even on slightly uneven floors and protect the floor from scratches. Robust Structure The mix of high-quality particleboard and sturdy steel makes this shelf more durable and sturdy. Anti-Tip Kit Fix the shelf to the wall with the included anti-tip kit for extra stability and added safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shelf was pretty easy to put together and looks super nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and aesthetically pleasing when all set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together and is a good size
reviews.reviewText: It took me about an hour to put together with no help. Feels pretty sturdy. i filled it up with books and it seems fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and looks nice
reviews.reviewText: I assembled this alone except that I needed help to stand it up and to move into its position against the wall. It is very sturdy and I liked the fact that it's an open shelf but with the bars at the end of each shelf which helps to keep books upright. It's a simple and sturdy design. I would just say be mindful to follow the exact order for the instructions because otherwise the bars don't line up with the pre-drilled holes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy bookshelf - rewrote the assembly instructions
reviews.reviewText: I like that this is a sturdy shelf system. The individual shelves are pretty weighty, and there's six of them on the unit. I knew my daughter and I would have some trouble sitting the unit upright if we followed the instructions as written, so we altered the assembly order.Instructions as written:1) assemble the three leg sections2) lay the legs on the floor3) attach the top shelf4) loosely attach the cross beams to the back5) attach the 2nd through 6th shelves6) tighten the cross beams7) attach the feet to the bottom8) sit upright and level9) attach to the wall with anti-tip kitInstructions as modified:1) assemble the three leg sections2) lay the legs on the floor3) attach the top shelf4) loosely attach the cross beams to the back5) attach the feet to the bottom6) attach the bottom shelf7) sit upright8) attach shelf 5 and then shelf 49) tighten cross beams on back10) attach shelf three and then shelf 211) level and attach to wallThis allowed us to sit the unit up before it became too heavy to lift. Also, since the top and bottom shelves were in place and squaring up the frame, it made it easy to attach the remaining shelves and get the screws through the frame and into the bottom of the shelves.As others mentioned, assembly took about an hour.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice and can hold a ton of books
reviews.reviewText: Pros: looks nice, super strong, can hold so many books without sagging, the anchor brackets have pre-installed holes for installation, I was able to assemble and install all by myselfNeutral: pictoral instructions like Ikea, so you have to make sure pieces are turned the right way or you'll be disassembling them laterCons: some of the stickers to identify parts left residue that needed to be removed with cleaner, but otherwise no real cons

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with it. Bought a second one immediately. Not too hard to build with two people.
